lyric:
[00:00.144]You've been waiting so long
[00:01.397]I'm here to answer your call
[00:03.200]I know that I shouldn't have had you waiting at all
[00:06.100]I've been so bu-sy but I've been thinking 'bout
[00:08.451]What I wanna do wit you
[00:10.566]I know them other guys
[00:12.186]They've been talking 'bout the way I do what I do
[00:15.112]They heard I was good they wanna see if it's true
[00:18.194]They know your the one I wanna give it to
[00:20.493]I can see you want me too
[00:22.322]Bring it~
[00:23.393]Oh with U with with with U with

[00:29.531]Oh with U with with with U with
[00:32.588]Oh with U with with with U
[00:35.357]With oh U with with U U
[00:38.204]With with with U with with with U
[00:41.313]With oh with U with with U U
[00:44.264]With oh with U with with U
[00:47.477]I was waitin for you to tell me you were ready
[00:51.161]I know what to do if only you would let me
[00:54.139]As long as your cool with it I'll treat ya right
[00:56.568]Here is where you wanna be
[00:58.606]I know them other guys
[01:00.199]They've been talkin 'bout the way I do what I do
[01:03.046]They heard I was good they wanna see if it's true
[01:06.077]They know you are the one I wanna give it to
[01:08.532]I can see you want me too
[01:10.465]And now it's Me & U

[02:20.526]Jo~with U U with with U with
[02:35.233]Drop it~
[02:47.484]You've been waiting so long
[02:49.234]I'm here to answer your call
[02:51.089]I know that I shouldn't have had you waiting at all
[02:54.145]I've been so bu-sy but I've been thinking 'bout
[02:56.470]What I wanna do wit you

[03:00.153]they've been talking 'bout the way I do what I do
[03:03.079]They heard I was good they wanna see if it's true
[03:06.188]They know your the one
tlyric:
[by:青蔚Wood]
[00:00.144]让你久等了~
[00:01.397]我也一直在等待你的来电
[00:03.200]我知道我不该让你等的
[00:06.100]我真的很忙但是我从来不去考虑这件事情
[00:08.451]我总想和你做些什么
[00:10.566]我知道那些家伙
[00:12.186]总在谈论我做事的方式
[00:15.112]当我做的无可挑剔时，他们总来看看是不是真的
[00:18.194]他们知道你是我唯一值得付出的人
[00:20.493]我看得出你也想要我
[00:22.322]把你的心带来~
